alert.note: Alert for East Turnagain Arm (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 5:47AM AKST until December 24 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and heavy rain. Additional snow accumulations of up to 8 inches followed by heavy rain. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...East Turnagain Arm. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Rain on snow covered roadways will cause hazardous travel and ponding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bands of moderate to heavy snow will move through Portage Valley and Girdwood Saturday night through early Sunday morning. Snowfall rates during this time may approach 2 to 3 inches per hour. Visibility will be significantly reduced during periods of heavy snowfall.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
